message:
SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 48
Translation from PROLEG to PROLOG(ASP)
(JURISIN 2010)
P = ⟨H, E⟩where H is as follows:
C ⇐B11, ..., B1n1.
C ⇐B21, ..., B2n2.
...
C ⇐Bk1, ..., Bknk.
and E is as follows:
exception(C, E1).
...
exception(C, Em).
⇓
C: −B11, ..., B1n1, not E1, ..., not Em.
C: −B21, ..., B2n2, not E1, ..., not Em.
...
C: −Bk1, ..., Bknk, not E1, ..., not Em.
Note that rules with the same head has the same negative literals.
48
speaker: SYSTEM
